errors.pattern: Git LFS is not installed|external filter 'git-lfs filter-process' failed
errors.cause: git-lfs binary not installed or hooks not set up

solutions.code: brew install git-lfs  # or apt install git-lfs\ngit lfs install

errors.pattern: smudge filter lfs failed|Object does not exist on the server|missing Git LFS object
errors.cause: Object not fetched or removed from remote

errors.pattern: exceeds Git LFS file size limit|repository is over its data quota
errors.message: Push rejected due to LFS quota
errors.cause: Remote storage quota exceeded or file too large

solutions.code: # Purchase additional LFS storage on hosting provider

errors.pattern: Encountered .* file\(s\) that should have been pointers|Smudge error .* matches LFS pattern
errors.message: Large files committed without LFS tracking

solutions.when: Need to store binaries as pointers

errors.pattern: batch response: Authentication required|Authorization error|Access denied
errors.cause: Missing credentials or expired token for LFS endpoints

solutions.code: git config credential.helper store\n# then push to prompt and save
git config lfs.url $(git remote get-url origin | sed 's#^git@#ssh://git@#')
